website_summaries.verdict: Excellent sound quality, especially for the price. You can find more expensive center channel speakers, but you don't really need to with this speaker.
pros: Angled top allows you to invert the speaker and place it below your TV
Provides crisp, clear sound, especially with dialogue
Sounds good with old or new receivers
Five-way binding post connectors make the speaker secure
cons: This is a fairly large speaker, so it can take up a lot of space depending on your setup

customer_reviews.title: The more speakers you add the less likely you will ever be satisfied with just a tv and no external speakers
customer_reviews.text: Not an audiophile by any stretch. This is my first center channel speaker. There is a noticeable difference between having it and not having it. You almost get the impression that your left and right speakers are thankful to have a center channel speaker picking up some of the slack. The more speakers you add the less likely you will ever be satisfied with just a tv and no external speakers. This totally eliminates that phenomena where you are watching a movie and it feels like the actors are speaking to low. Voice and music are better when separate each flowing through their own speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Almost satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Very nice center channel speaker
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a really decent center channel, handling vocal range with just the right hint of warmth. I've set it up with my Denon 7.1 system to replace a center channel speaker costing several times this one, and I like this one much better in all respects, so that says a lot. For the money, very hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R DesRoches

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and clear, no more Closed Captioning!
customer_reviews.text: My pet peeve with today's TV shows is how they bury the dialogue with suspenseful music. This center channel speaker from Polk Audio provides crisp, clear dialogue and makes it a joy to watch my favorite shows without using the Closed Captioning. It also puts to rest the suggestion that it's MY fault for going deaf. I had a center speaker before (had to leave the speakers when I moved), and it wasn't nearly as clear as the Polk.
customer_reviews.author: tomtees

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: The Polk CS10 center channel speaker was purchased to replace an older center channel speaker since I could no longer distinguish the dialog in a movie and had to use closed captioning. I purchased another brand at first and had to return it immediately because it sounded tinny. This time I did a little research and found the Polk CS10 had gotten great reviews. I can honestly say that the reviewers were correct. The clarity of sound and speech sets the CS10 ahead of its competition. The CS10 is absolutely the best value in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Spyder

customer_reviews.title: You  need one of these
customer_reviews.text: Polk builds a decent, mid-grade speaker. I bought this to go with a pair of Polk Audio Monitor 60 Series II floor-standing speakers when I upgraded my family room entertainment center from a 2.1 soundbar to a 3.0 component system. It matches the performance and appearance of those front mains very nicely. It's a bit large. Pay attention to the dimensions and make sure it will physically fit the area immediately below or above your screen. Yes, you need a center channel speaker, even for a a simple non-surround stereo setup. Assuming that your AV receiver can be correctly configured for 3.0, the difference with and without a center channel to handle mid-range and dialog is quite dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied ears
customer_reviews.text: The CS-10 met my needs at a very decent price. For years I didn't have a center channel speaker. Last month I repurposed a pair of Polk Bookshelf S10 Speaker wired in series to see what I was missing. The improvement was instantly noticed. I could hear the dialogue much more clearly. However, the sound was boxy even after playing around with positioning and tone. So, I bought the Cs-10 speaker and really hoping for a minor miracle since the Polk bookshelf speakers are actually pretty decent. Well, the CS-10 did the trick. Clear, clean and strong sound. I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Pen name

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but takes up a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this center channel setup because I had the space on my entertainment center and a sound bar wouldn't be practical with the projector screen. At first it was a bit loud. After some tuning in my receiver all is good and the sound is great. Make sure you have the appropriate speaker wire for your receiver. I don't believe this will take banana clips without any modification. The only con I have is the size. This is very long and deep taking up the majority of my entertainment stands center shelf. If space is an issue you might want to consider something smaller. I've been very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EGReviewsTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Have space for this Juggernaut
customer_reviews.text: It was only a matter of time until I bought this. My classic Pioneer HPM-100s and Marantz SR-2252 Receiver were slowly replaced with new components that started many years ago. Stereo receiver to Pioneer Elite SC-75 AVR, Akai Open reel to Oppo BDP-103 Blu-ray player. Onkyo SW to Polk 12-inch Powered sub, Cerwin Vega satellites to Polk. and now finally my old but reliable Pioneer Center Ch speaker to this wonderful CS-10. Everything matches and sounds lovely. Excellent sensitivity, same impedance as my other Polk speakers which are bi-amped, the CS-10 is a delight with X-over at 50 Hz. Love them...you will too.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Fit well with my existing Polk speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Polk Products and this speaker didn't disappoint. Purchased to replace a much larger/older Polk center channel that would not fit into our new TV stand. While the sound on this speaker can't really compare to it's big older brother that was more than twice the size, it still sounds great and has a good matching timbre with my other older Polk speakers. Very solid and attractive like all Polk products.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Hochstatter

customer_reviews.title: Polk is hard to beat for the money
customer_reviews.text: Most people don't know that Polk is a great speaker for the money. I bought this on sale for about $99. It sounds about as good as my expensive JBL in a larger area. This Polk ended up in the Master BR in a new low budget home theater system powered by a Harman Kardon 5.1 receiver. I was surprised on the range this speaker puts out for being a Center. In the larger area I also have Polk T50 towers as centers Right & Left. I have never been disappointed with any Polk speaker...
customer_reviews.author: AmericanPatrick

customer_reviews.title: Great center speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute BEST quality center speaker you can buy at this price point. Polk Audio is no joke! This was the missing piece for our home theater and compliments the JBL towers, and the JBL surrounds. I no longer have to crank it up to hear the dialogue in movies! Don't even think twice if you need a center speaker... Just buy it. You won't ever regret it!
customer_reviews.author: ohYew812

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm not blown away like the other reviewers. But I am satisfied. There is a lot of value with this speaker. I was hoping to have my face melted off to be honest. The clarity is good. This speaker is good for dialogue. If you're looking to round out a modest surround sound or upgrading, this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Setch

customer_reviews.title: Solid Center
customer_reviews.text: Solid little center. To me Polk are a little harsh on their highs, but that is just me. If you have a good EQ on the Amp, you might be able to adjust it down. Mids are ok. Bass is good. I set this up in my Dads house with Polk T-15 as L/R, and SL,SR, a Yamaha 10 inch sub which is good enough for his room. Solid sounding system and good solid center, not the best but if you’re rolling Polk, then go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great center speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't consider myself an audiophile but this center speaker is so much better than what I previously had! It's also at least 4x larger, but sometimes bigger it's truly better. I also like how the angled side allows you to have it on the floor or in my case the bottom shelf of a shelving unit. Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Probst

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first polk audio speaker, after researching a lot I decided to go with this for my home theater system, hooked it up to a Yahama 483BL, and it really sound great! I couldn't bring home (overseas) the front speakers to go with this once, but definitely can't wait to buy those and put it all together for my starter 3.1 system (yes, I'm going slow to put it all together). Right now I have this center speaker and some little micca satellites speakers for FR L and R, better than nothing I guess!! but I'll definitely go for POLK all the way, sounds great and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: reaga master

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Added this Center to my system replacing an ancient Advent Audio Focus II with cracked dome (23 years old). Paired with Polk Monitor 50 mains, Rti35 surrounds and PSW10 subwoofer. The all Polk lineup sounds great and the center channel performance is greatly improved. Good price and Polk quality make this an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: No More Muffled Voices
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to address the issue some reviewers had with this item. If voices sound muffled it might be due to the receiver being underpowered or the level on the channel turned down too low. The speaker is not perfect, but it should not make voices sound muffled.
customer_reviews.author: Soulfuljim

customer_reviews.title: Steals the show from my front towers
customer_reviews.text: From my experience, most digital surround formats have dialogue coming through the center speaker. So all my TV shows, movies, etc... tend to utilize the center speaker the majority of the time. So when the war breaks out and my front towers are activated, the center speaker seems to overpower my old tower speakers. The highs are higher and the mids seem to be stronger. Long story short, I need new towers now...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great center speaker at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace a 12 year old center speaker that we thought had given us good sound. This Polk speaker is way better. The tone and clarity of voices is much more pronounced and music and sound effects are very well reproduced. The sound blends much better with very expensive Hi-Fi right and left channel speakers we have had for over 30 years. Great addition to our 7.1 surround system.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty darn big
customer_reviews.text: My only real issue with this thing is the size. It's pretty darn big, and I plan to set up a wall shelf for it. Otherwise, I'm pretty happy with what I got for the price. Took a fair bit of tweaking to get it fit in with my existing speakers, but I'm glad I didn't give up on it. I personally don't feel the audio is as clear as a lot of reviews state... Dialogue isn't any clearer than the last basic center speaker I had, for instance. Still, it's a great value when you compare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound at an incredible price.
customer_reviews.text: I am no audiophile and I was using a speaker set bought as a package with what I thought was a good center. I can only say this upgrade is awesome. It turned my family room alive with sound. Now I know this is purely unscientific but all I can say is the sound to me is incredible. Never thought a speaker could make this much difference. It gives movies a new dynamic.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: but I have never heard such clarity before (I had a Bose center channel and Bose standing speakers and I have heard numerous sou
customer_reviews.text: My setup is a pair of Riga speakers and a low end Yamaha Receiver. The speaker looks clunky and unimpressive, but I have never heard such clarity before (I had a Bose center channel and Bose standing speakers and I have heard numerous sound-bars at Best Buy and Frys). The center channel is so clear, I tend to let it dominate the side speakers. Even at very low volumes, I can discern every mumble and corner scrapes. It does not push the higher frequencies which is why the vocal clarity is so astonishing. It just seems to faithfully recreate sound with awesome clarity - no digital gimmickry - just great speaker mechanics and electronics.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: This is a BIG Mother!!
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is very good,, but a little boomie .. sound is fine but a lot of bottom end. looks good, price is fine. BUT this sucker is HUGE !! Look closely at the spec's before you purchase. Not only is it tall, but also long. It does not fit under my tv which is mounted on the wall and if you use it upside down (you are able to , to direct sound more in your direction,, it is even taller !!
customer_reviews.author: Gareth B. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Good speakers. Nice case, and high quality sound. I bought these to replace a 20 year old center speaker set, which was underpowered and required the volume to be turned up so high that music or sound effects had you reaching for the remote to turn the volume down. Now, the sound level is similar between conversations and effects.
customer_reviews.author: ian g kress

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the old for this Center Channel
customer_reviews.text: Great Center Channel Speaker. The CS10 is an awesome addition to my Denon AVR X3600. The sound is clear and I’ve maxed the volume out on the receiver and never once heard crackling. The screen comes off but you have to pull on it hard. I felt I was going to break it, I don’t ever take it off after I tried it once. But good center channel to add to or upgrade an old one.
customer_reviews.author: Marc B.

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I could go on and on about spectrum analyzers and Crom knows what else, but that's probably more than most care to read. It's safe to say, this speaker sounds great with a wide range of DTS-HD and Dolby true HD at blazing volumes, and the price is certainly right. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Son of Asgard

customer_reviews.title: Large single speaker
customer_reviews.text: It is much larger than I expected it to be. Looking back, I now see the dimensions, but the listing would benefit from a picture that included some context. No complaints on the item itself; I purchased it to replace the center speaker of a system I bought a year ago. Needless to say the system has much more power than it did originally.
customer_reviews.author: Zaky-Bear

customer_reviews.title: how do I enjoy thee.
customer_reviews.text: Polk, oh Polk, how do I enjoy thee...whether watching Sci-Fi, Horror, Action or playing some R&B or Jazz these speakers are on point for their price range. The build and quality of this speaker is cool. Heavy, a bit large, but delivers the goods. I'm sure if I sat down to truly break down the sound quality I could even after being years removed from the audio game, however these are much better than most in the price range and even some higher priced.
customer_reviews.author: CompewterBlue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent center channel speaker!  Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent center speaker. I gave up my older, much smaller one due to the speaker cone starting to rattle and lose sound quality (it's old). This speaker, because of it's ability to reproduce all frequencies with more power, has improved the sound field greatly. Dialogue is much cleaner and more understandable. The mid-range and bass frequencies come through nicely. I have a crossover set to send the deeper base to the subwoofer. I wanted more crisp treble, so I adjusted the equalizer on my Yamaha unit for the center channel to give more punch to the highend spectrum. Beautiful! Love this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Greg in Clearwater

customer_reviews.title: I am not an audiophile but it sounds great to me
customer_reviews.text: Matched this with a yamaha rx-383 receiver, two tsi100 bookshelf speakers and a PSW505 subwoofer. I am not an audiophile but it sounds great to me. Really brings music and home theater to life. At very high volumes, the bookshelf speakers give before the receiver reaches full power. But it's already intolerably loud at that point anyways.
customer_reviews.author: jinx10000

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and works quite well
customer_reviews.text: This is my first center speaker. I also purchased a Polk subwoofer to go with my large front speakers and rear speakers. I now have true 5.1 sound. I'm happy with the CS10. It seems to produce good sound and has improved my ability to hear conversations during movies and tv shows tremendously. I can't really comment on the quality compared to other center speakers as I've never really listened to any, but I'm certainly happy with this one. It's stylish and seems to work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great center channel speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great center channel speaker. I paired it with some Polk series 70 monitor IIs for a great front theater setup. The cs10 is great sounding next to these speakers. Gave my system a more full-range sound especially in the mids and low frequency’s. Is a bit on the heavy side due to the magnetic shielding but no more than other center channel speakers.
customer_reviews.author: JoAmazonDude

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish and sould is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Speaker upgrades are always hard to do. I also didn't want to spend a ton of money so I thought I would give Polk Audio a go.. Well I have had this now for a while and I love it! Quality of sound coming out of it is super clean and well worth the money. I will eventually buy more Polk audio gear to replace my old sony speakers. The color and quality of the box these speaker are in are very very nice.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have the room!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is enormous compared to my stock Onkyo center, but the sound quality is night and day and for all other centers in this price range I believe it’s the best bang for your buck since I’m not an audiofile by any means but I really enjoy the new technologies. I’m running it with a Onkyo 676 at 5.1.2 and I’m extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: SWEET!!
customer_reviews.text: My old onkyo center speaker after 10 years finally went out, Did some research here and there, the reviews were good for this cs10. Well hooked it up today, and I am really blown away by the great sound this speaker puts out. Played some eric Clapton, and some merle haggard and it just sounds sweet... You can not go wrong with this speaker! Now I am gonna save up for a couple of nice polk floor standing fronts..Great deal for 100.00 Pitbullman 216
customer_reviews.author: pitbullman216

customer_reviews.title: good not great
customer_reviews.text: this is a really solid center channel. it is a little echo-ey at times but it is very solid for the money. it is better than any factory center and many after-market on the market but it is not great. i would recommend it for the money but...
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this center channel. It is loud. It hasn’t distorted at high volume. It’s good looking. It brought my vocals to life. Listening to Game of Thrones on this thing is a great experience. The dragons screeching and the armies thumping. Music sounds great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Sail Nearing 6
customer_reviews.text: Almost six years and this center sound speaker has function without a glitch. Clear audio and response time. No lag, crack, pop, hiss or any unusual sounds coming from it. Price point remains excellent after all these years. No gouging from Polk Audio.
customer_reviews.author: LJABQ

customer_reviews.title: Wow - blows me away
customer_reviews.text: Thought my hearing loss (too many decades of loud rock) was responsible for the badly muddled audio from my home theater system. The switch to this Polk center channel offered an incredible mid and high range difference and improvement. I now can hear all TV or movie dialogue clearly. Love this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: 1baysailor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable sound. Originally had the top of the line Polk center speaker which had a good sound, but it was too big. Size dictated the purchase of this unit. Prefer the sound of the CS10. So crisp and clear I have to turn down the dbs so not to overpower my top of the line Polk 265 LS wall units.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: hearing things that I never have before.
customer_reviews.text: My system has always fallen short on the center channel. I was running a smaller Polk Audio. b But this speaker took care of that. I'm hearing things that I never have before. It is a little larger in real life than in my mind when I read the specs.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Chatfield

customer_reviews.title: This thing is BIG!
customer_reviews.text: Just a fair warning, this speaker is slightly bigger than my reciever and fits very awkwardly into my entertainment system. I actually had to set a shelf on top of the speaker because the adjustable shelving didn't expand enough. Other than that I have no complaints. Like: Great sound, easy setup with solid connections (screw versus spring), and it can get LOUD! I no longer have the problem of dialogue getting drowned out by the surround/background noises. Dislike: Big and doesn't quite fit standard etertainment system sizes. If you took off the feet it would slide in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Bearforce

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value & Sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect center channel for my Polk audio set up. I couldn’t be happier with the sound quality & value of this speaker! I paired it with the tsi200 bookshelf speakers, and psw10 sub, and am thrilled with the outstanding surround sound setup! Would definitely recommend going with the entire setup!
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Great center speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: Man.... this center speaker sound good!! I was worry at first because never own polk audio before, but my worry diminished. After I calibrated the whole speaker system, man it sound good! Watching movies, listen to music and playing games. This center speaker give out clear sound. Worth every dollar. Not bad for a speaker with reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to ears and eyes
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd CS10. I think the sound is very good across a wide range of frequency, especially considering the moderate price (<$100) for a full fledged home audio speaker. The cherry wood color is beautiful (so it makes my the other CS10, which is in black, look boring and unattractive). Wish the side panels are also in cherry, but no real complaint.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDwellerTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Quite Large, Quite Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes watching TV and movies more enjoyable. Dialogue is clear and watching Blu-Rays is outstanding. All the sounds are distinguished perfectly. You hear what you're supposed to hear, in the right way. I would definitely recommend this for a budget minded person like myself. My setup includes: Yamaha RX-V373 5.1-Channel AV Receiver Sony SS-F6000 Floorstanding 4-Way Speakers Polk Audio CS10 Center Channel Speaker Polk Audio PSW10 10-Inch Monitor Series Powered Subwoofer Polk Audio Monitor series II AM3095-A Rear Surround Sony PS3 Samsung 46" LED Smart TV
customer_reviews.author: VegasKev

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Polk has done it again...this center speaker rocks!! If you don't mind size when it comes to home audio speakers then this speaker is a sweet deal for you. I have it in my living room which is larger than average and I hear all the dialog the way it's intended to sound. I have it hooked to my pioneer receiver along with four Polk audio monitor 60 series speakers and a 10" Polk audio powered sub woofer. The sound is truly amazing and the craftsmen ship is second to none. Sure there are better speakers if you want to spend hundreds or even thousands more, but for 99 bucks you can't go wrong with this center speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Getch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flat response
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many, but this center channel is the best. If I close my eyes - it seems the actors are in the room with me. Can't get much better than that. Superb! Sounds better than other Center Channels of considerably more cost.
customer_reviews.author: bryan  kendall

customer_reviews.title: night and day
customer_reviews.text: I have a very nice Yamaha receiver, two Yamaha subs and the usual small satellite speakers, but there was something not right, so after doing some reading I decided it was the centre speaker, I read so many 5 star reviews on this CS10 unit I went what the heck, and got it, yes its big, but oh boy the clarity of movies and music, I now feel solid base thuds not warbles and reverberations, its like I replaced the whole system, best money I have spent in a long time, and if this the sound quality from this, then I shall be upgrading the satellites to PolK Audio over the next few months, you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a good speaker not many center speakers are going to better especially for the price. It's not noticeable or a miracle worker for blu ray speaking volumes.
customer_reviews.author: OneTimez1

customer_reviews.title: Great.  Bigger than realized.
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this I was using one of the original speakers from my first Panasonic 5.1 surround system. That was a small speaker but it started to sound hollow after replacing all the other ones with Yamaha in-ceiling speakers. I figured the time was right to upgrade. Even though the dimensions of the Polk are listed, I didn't fully realize how big it would actually be until I unboxed it. It really is big. Mounting my 55" tv to the wall helped but I really wouldn't recommend this for any TV smaller than 55".
customer_reviews.author: Ed MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: A "good enough" center speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this mainly because of size (it fit in my TV stand whereas the Polk CS2 didn't). I agree with all the others who have said if you watch movies, you NEED a good center speaker if you want to clearly hear the dialog. This one gets the job done, but I'm sure the more expensive (and unfortunately bigger) CS2 would've been a better match to my Monitor 75t front speakers. For the price, I think this is an awesome choice. Definitely "good enough".
customer_reviews.author: LoneJohnny5

customer_reviews.title: Great for those having trouble hearing dialogue
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in order to hear conversations well and it's excellent! Nice and clear at lower volumes. With the old one, I had to have it loud and still couldn't understand lower pitched voices. Seems like it's built really well and has an air opening in the back like a subwoofer. Definitely a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Jack12

customer_reviews.title: Great Center Channel Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this speaker nearly a year now and have not been disappointed the first time. It is an amazing center channel speaker with great mids and highs. Great for watching movies at high volume and also for watching the news or whatever. It just sounds good. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Syntax

customer_reviews.title: A LOT of sound for a little money
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought these speakers, I only had an old set of 100 shelf speakers. So for my birthday, I added this center speaker. It easily doubled my sound and I was able to achieve a fantastically clear mid-range that I was just not able to get with my always too tinny or too bassy shelf speakers. When I added the PolkAudio 10-inch subwooferto the mix, it sound even more incredible! I like the new sound so much, I plan on replacing the shelf speakers with PolkAudio speakers next year.
customer_reviews.author: Tiktaalik

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good but big and bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great but much bigger than I expected. Check the measurements before you order if you plan on using it in a tight space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love polk audio and for the price you cant beat ...
customer_reviews.text: I love polk audio and for the price you cant beat the quality. I paired this with a polk subwoofer and two front speakers. People always compliment my system and think i spent thousands. Its great quality. Like others mentioned it is bigger than expected. The sound quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge A

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a blown JBL Control with this setup. Coupled with my Yamaha surround system, this really cleared up the dialog quite a bit. Easy to install. Minimal fuss with my surround settings to make it work. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Rodenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: great sound, good price
customer_reviews.text: Quality speaker, great sound, good price. Slightly bigger than I would have liked - it is not exactly "unobtrusive" but there's nothing to argue with the sound. Used with Yamaha RX-V377 receiver, a couple of old Pioneer floor standing speakers, some ancient Mission bookshelf speakers as rear surround, and a Yamaha YST-SW012 subwoofer. Sounds amazing - suspect it would sound pretty good with almost any setup.
customer_reviews.author: pdm

customer_reviews.title: The Center of All Things
customer_reviews.text: This center speaker is the bomb, it's giving me what I was looking for in a center channel speakers. The price, quality and sound makes it to be a great choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Polk Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I buy Polk speakers often because the quality and sound are fantastic, and the prices are reasonable. This center speaker sounds great, and was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With My Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Monday from a 3rd party seller and it was delivered Wednesday. Very fast shipping. The speaker is very sexy looking, and it sounds great. Its a little large so make sure you have space for it. For the money it is the best bank for the buck Polk or center channel speaker in general. Being someone who is very particular about quality I can say without a doubt in my mind that this is a nice piece of hardware. I have this speaker paired to Sony ss-f6000 towers, Sony sub, pioneer amp, Bose built-in rears. It matches the Sony finish perfectly with or without covers on.
customer_reviews.author: the guru

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Speaker - Just make sure it fits!
customer_reviews.text: This is an OUTSTANDING Speaker. My hearing sucks (from years of ear buds and loud music) and I can clearly hear the dialogue in movies and TV shows. However, be mindful of the depth of the speaker. It is nearly 10” deep, and my new Samsung LED TV is only 3” deep when attached to the wall. So nearly 1⁄2 a foot of the speaker protrudes out past the TV, which is not aesthetically pleasing. To be perfectly clear, this is a great speaker and whole heartily recommend it, especially if you have hearing issues. Just make sure it fits with your set-up
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Y.

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank, great voices.
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a center channel speaker, but you might say I'm growing surround sound one or two speakers at a time. I have an 8" Polk subwoofer and two Polk floor standing speakers and they sounded pretty good. I decided to go 4.1 about 5 months ago by adding this center channel speaker. I added it and then ran the set up program on my Pioneer VSX-920 receiver again and voila!, instant intense center channel action! Voices are much clearer; no more "off stage" kind of voices. They are right in front now. It's all become so clear to me now! What's next? Surround speakers? Maybe a winter time addition. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: C. D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Recommended purchase. Only thing is the speaker box had ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes a huge difference. For me, the test of centre speakers is the psych hospital scene in Terminator 2. I could hear her voice clearly and didnt need to adjust at times during the movie. Recommended purchase. Only thing is the speaker box had serious damage when it arrived which resulted in the speaker and grille being damaged. I sent an email off to see if I can get a replacement grille. The speaker damages is minor and am prepared to live with it. See photos
customer_reviews.author: andrew mcbiff

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a solid center channel at a great price. Sound is smooth and accurate . Can’t beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KGarrison1

customer_reviews.title: fantastic boost to my home theater project
customer_reviews.text: fantastic boost to my home theater project. Since moving to our new house the room is much bigger than my Klipsch unit could deal with and this beasty fills the bill nicely for me without breaking the bank .. my wife smiles.
customer_reviews.author: John Fastenow

customer_reviews.title: No we can set the volume on the AV system and the speaker provides a perfect dialogue sound level relative to the surround speak
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable upgrade over previous Center Channel Speaker (BIC America). Wife and I were constantly struggling with adjusting the volume on the HT system in order to hear the dialogue from movies, tv, etc. We no longer have that problem. The quality of dialogue from this speaker is really special. No we can set the volume on the AV system and the speaker provides a perfect dialogue sound level relative to the surround speakers. Very happy with the purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper McFearson

customer_reviews.title: Needed it for surround sound
customer_reviews.text: My son found this on a sale at Amazon and it was the last piece we needed for my surround sound. Good.
customer_reviews.author: Texas EX

customer_reviews.title: and the quality and clarity of the sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Have paired this with a pair of Polk Bookshelf speakers, eventually want to get a pair of towers to get the full surround experience. The sound is crisp and clear. Living in an apartment building and working odd hours, means for some late nights, a lot of times I have to listen with the volume turned way down low, and the quality and clarity of the sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasingly surprised at the quality of sound from the center speaker. I wish I’d made a decision to purchase it sooner. This was a great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: L.F Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Too much tutor noise and voice out at volume 70%
customer_reviews.author: AR siddiq

customer_reviews.title: Great sound output
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this speaker for several months now and it sounds awesome! Voices and other sounds directed to the center channel are extremely clear and crisp. The speaker also has a fairly good amount of lows and mids to balance out the sound. The rest of my setup is as follows: Denon AVR1912 Klipsh Towers (The ones that were exclusive to BestBuy, not sure of the model) Polk Audio rears (Older series of bookshelf speakers I bought from a friend)
customer_reviews.author: Roger G.

customer_reviews.title: Polk Audio CS10 center speaker
customer_reviews.text: A very nice replacement for my Yamaha center speaker. Although I have a 10" Velodyne subwoofer in my theater that does a great job, this unit adds some bass tonality to the center location and more overall tonal body. Money well spent. Adding this unit to the mix and setting my speakers to THX has breathed new life into my theater.
customer_reviews.author: slack machine

customer_reviews.title: So that is what he said.
customer_reviews.text: Yes! I can hear dialog in my surround sound system now. I had an old Bose center speaker forever. Why?
customer_reviews.author: Billy Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Immensely clear. Immaculate sound. Treat yourself to this ...
customer_reviews.text: Immensely clear. Immaculate sound. Treat yourself to this gem. Sounds clearer than anything I’ve owned. Pound for pound comparable with my sonos playbar. That says a lot
customer_reviews.author: Hamisabaii

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough about Polk home audio products.
customer_reviews.text: This just about completes my Polk audio speaker set... I really love the quality, sound, and pricing of the CS and Monitor series. This speaker has added a lot of depth and range to my system and we are really enjoying it. Looks awesome to boot!
customer_reviews.author: The Great

customer_reviews.title: This is one very good center speaker
customer_reviews.text: Updated the surround from 6.1 to a 7.2 and needed a good center speaker to go with my Bose cubes. This speaker did a great job of filling the bill. Blended very with the Bose and is clear as bell. I'm getting older now and for some reason having a hard time understanding females with English accents. HBO's NETWORK, PBS and BBC news and even CNBC, English accented women seem to be the rage these days, so I had to make some adjustments or turn off the TV.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is great. I immediately noticed a difference in my sound ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. I immediately noticed a difference in my sound field with this installed over the smaller one I had. I also noticed the timbre matching between this speaker and the Polk Audio TSi 400 tower speakers I had. Everything was much more clear and even across the board. The one thing that surprised me was the actual size of the speaker. It is quite a bit larger than my old center channel and it took me by surprise. If you are going to buy this product, make sure you measure the dimensions first, as it's quite large. Great sound however.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great Center Channel
customer_reviews.text: I was using Cambridge Soundworks Center Channel Plus Speaker. I thought that it sounded good. I was using the Cambridge for like 6 years so I really didn't know anything else. I have to say that the Polk Cs10 is a lot more fuller in sound as far as music and works great with movies. Voice sounds more natural with some mid bass to them. I have a set of Polk M20's that I am upgrading to M50's. Don't know if I'll be using the M20's as backs or not, but all in all the Cs10 is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Capasso

customer_reviews.title: Utmost sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with two Polk Audio series 70 monitor towers and the sound quality is superior. The matte and piano finish also make it sleek.
customer_reviews.author: N. T. Tackie

customer_reviews.title: 2 small woofers (more like mid-range drivers) & a tweeter
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly substantial center channel speaker - a well-made & very good-sounding unit... 2 small woofers (more like mid-range drivers) & a tweeter... when running my system at fairly high levels, I can feel a substantial amount of air being pumped out the rear port... works well w/ my Yamaha 5.1 Surround receiver (100w/channel RMS)... sounds good, reasonable price, I'm happy w/ it...
customer_reviews.author: Bob, Temple, NH

customer_reviews.title: Polk Audio CS10 - crystal clear highs and impressive low end bass!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough to praise this center speaker from Polk Audio. The sound quality is amazing! Crystal clear highs and impressive low end bass! I was considering the Polk CS20 over this model. I'm glad I didn't go with the larger one. Our TV/Movie room is large however this center has no problem delivering rib shaking sound, especially with paired with a Polk Audio PS505 Sub Woofer. My only regret, I didn't buy this sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Like many seniors we have trouble understanding dialog and this has helped.
customer_reviews.author: William Mccullough

customer_reviews.title: ... other polk speakers and pioneer amp this center sounds amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: paired with my other polk speakers and pioneer amp this center sounds amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken W.

customer_reviews.title: Great center channel speaker
customer_reviews.text: A good, well built speaker. The sound quality that comes out of it is great and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Warpiper

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Running Onkyo 150 watt receiver and it handles every bit of it with great acoustic highs, mids and surprisingly lows.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Emery

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME center channel
customer_reviews.text: I have an Onkyo TX-SR606 receiver that came as part of an Onkyo home theater system, complete w/Onkyo speakers. The weakest speaker of the package was, by far, the center channel. I replaced it with the Polk CS10 center channel and could not be more satisfied. It brought the whole system to life! And, the sound quality from the Polk is top notch. It exceeded my expectations. I have been listening to it for a month or so at this point, and I still am amazed at the difference. Friends noticed the difference in sound quality, too. This center channel is the best center channel for the price...hands down.
customer_reviews.author: A. Farris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent center channel speaker from Polk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a center channel speaker for my home theater which includes a couple of floor standing Polk Monitor-70's and a couple of Polk T15's in the rear. I am really impressed with the crisp vocals produced from this speaker. As someone who watched a lot of documentaries, this really made a huge difference in the quality of narration. It is also great for listening to vocals in music (if you do listen to someone with good vocal talent). This is a great buy for eighty bucks and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shyam Sundar

customer_reviews.title: Great  product, looks great, sounds even better
customer_reviews.text: BEST Centre speaker I've owned. Is exceptionally well built. I have always hung the Centre over my tv and directed it downward. Thus definately will be placed under the tv. Is pretty large and fairly heavy.. Looks great, sounds even better. The highs and dialogue come through like no other . You get a clean crisp sound, vocals are as good as being there.
customer_reviews.author: az jim

customer_reviews.title: Good center channel but it lacks deep bass
customer_reviews.text: From the size and weight of this speaker I had expected more low end performance. But, mids and highs sound great. Great rich sound, just like you'd expect from Polk. In retrospect, I wish I had spent another hundred or two and used a full size speaker for the home theater's center channel. This would be amazing sound for under a TV in the living room and it serves reasonably well in a surround sound system with a subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This replacement for my old overpriced and under-performing JBLs is worth every nickel. Have replaced all my old speakers with Polks; maybe they're not the height of sophistication with the audiophile crowd, but for a simple TV surround system they are a lot of good-performing bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Picture is misleading on speaker depth; pay attention to listed dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: BIG and Sounds like it
customer_reviews.text: This is yet another high quality Polk Audio product with great sound for a very good price. This baby is BIG, and puts out some serious clear and nice sound. I've tried it with some Blu Ray Movies and some various genre's of music ranging from punchy blues to smooth jazz. This CS10 is a keeper. Does the job, really well. For more info on my entire system setup, checkout my other reviews. I think I put together a very nice sounding system for a very nice price. Thanks to Team Amazon and their partners, I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Typhoon Jenkins III

customer_reviews.title: just great
customer_reviews.text: I used a JBL center speaker an change for this, amazing, great, clear, crispy, brilliant. It enhances the subwoofer, feel the voice next to you, your senses are touched. i think now i will need a pair (R L)of front speakers of higher level. the best purchase for that price, it is a pleasure to hear a concert with this central speaker, you must notice that has an important size and weight. as usual, out there exist, ferrari or aston martin but you can get your destination at the same time with a BMW.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. M. E

customer_reviews.title: Polk audio quality at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement for my old home theater center speaker. Sounds great in my garage!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. For $100 I was really surprised at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. For $100 I was really surprised at the clarity. The space is a good sized bedroom so I'm not trying to fill up a concert hall. Pretty much movies and video games. I guess you could spend more but to my ears it sounds great. I definitely recommend it. There isn't a whole lot of bass but that's why you have a sub. My make-shift setup: This center, a couple small Bose cubes for the fronts, a couple of Panasonic bookshelf speakers I have kept from a Home Theater in a Box system for X-mas many years ago and 100 watt Sony sub.
customer_reviews.author: hhound8

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research and read many reviews of center channel speakers. I recently upgraded my receiver and was looking for an upgrade for my Bose center channel. I finally settled on the Polk C10 even though some had recommended the bigger C20. There is nothing small about this speaker, size wise or sound wise and I am extremely happy with my choice of this speaker. My listening room is rather open and big, but the sound is clean, clear and fills the room. Nothing lacking in its performance. MK
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality isn't that great. Not very good with low frequencies
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality isn't that great. Not very good with low frequencies. You'll have to spend some time matching it to your other speakers. But it gets the job done for a budget center.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for home theatre
customer_reviews.text: Great value and excellent sound. The center speaker is the predominant source of dialogue so don't skimp. The larger speakers provide depth and lifelike quality. We installed this below a 75" 4K, on top shelf of the equipment rack. Despite its relatively large size, it appears classy and unobtrusive, especially well-sized for the larger tv.
customer_reviews.author: mwtravlr

product_meta.title: Polk Audio CS10 Center Channel Speaker (Single, Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackThe CS10 center, like its larger brother the CS20 sounds just as good but is a little smaller. It still has an angled top allowing you to invert the speaker and place it below your TV directing sound towards the listening area. CS10 works great with the TSi100, TSi200 and others. Speaking of the cabinet (no, not the Presidential Cabinet), it's extensively braced from MDF with ¾ Inch thick baffles. Cheaper speakers will use other material such as particle board which is flimsy, robbing you of good sound. With pewter accents, a piano black top plate and removable black grille, TSi speakers look awesome and take up less than one square foot. All models are available in a choice of black or cherry wood grain, so don't be ashamed to show off your stereo equipment.

AMAZON.COM



Unlike the electronics, your speakers won't go out of date, so bring out the most in your entertainment experience with Polk TSi Series. A great match to the TSi Series, the Polk Audio CS10 center channel speaker--the most important speaker in surround sound--is smaller than its sibling CS20, but still sounds just as good. And it has an angled top allowing you to invert the speaker and place it below your TV--directing sound towards the listening area. The TSi Series and the CS10 were designed to be highly efficient, so they can be driven easily by unpretentious receivers, and they're voice-matched for lifelike surround sound environments. This speaker in black measures 6-1/2 by 20 x 9-3/4 inches (HxWxD).



The Polk Audio CS10 center channel speaker in black (see larger image).

KEY FEATURES
QUALITY BUILT CABINETS.
The cabinet is extensively braced from MDF with 3/4-inch thick baffles. Cheaper speakers will use other material such as particle board which is flimsy, robbing you of good sound. With pewter accents, a piano black top accents and removable black grille, the CS10 looks awesome. 

HIGH EFFICIENCY DESIGN.
Compatible with practically all electronics, these are speakers that produce sound that's open, spacious and clear, even when driven by modestly-powered amplifiers and receivers. No matter if you just bought a new digital surround receiver, or are hooking up this CS10 or TSi Series speakers to vintage electronics, they will still sound great.

NARROW BAFFLE GEOMETRY.
Bringing the best of both worlds- narrow baffle geometry is a design that creates a sleek looking speaker with slick sound. First the high quality cabinet is slender (less than one square foot) and tucks away easily in your room. The smaller-diameter speaker components are lighter in mass, translating to clearer sound.




FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The CS10 features an innovative cabinet design that gives you the flexibility to choose which placement, above or beneath your TV, works best for you. Revel in a wide, deep, dynamic center channel soundstage with pinpoint details. Because they are timbre-matched to the TSi Series, you can build a system with seamless, realistic blending throughout, for a more immersive surround sound environment!

key features

 * Polk’s proprietary, patented Dynamic Balance® technology allows our engineers to design out distortion-causing driver and system resonances, so you only hear the good sounds. 
 * Klippel motor optimization uses laser measurement technology to ensure a smooth excursion path at either end of the volume spectrum for uniform performance at both low and high volumes. 
 * Unlike metal domes, silk dome tweeters deliver clear and detailed highs, without fatigue, even at high volume. 
 * TSi’s high efficiency design results in sound that’s spacious and clear, warm and realistic, when combined with practically any electronics, even the most modestly-powered amplifier or receiver. 

take a look inside this product 



technology

Silk dome tweeter delivers clear and detailed highs, without fatigue, even at high volume. 

Durable, efficient, and tuned with our Dynamic Balance process, TSi Series polycarbonate cones produce smooth, natural sound.

Choose the flat side if you have an angled stand, or are placing the speaker above your television. Flip the enclosure and use the angled cabinet to "aim" the imaging when you're placing the speaker on the floor in front of your TV, or under your screen.

The CS10 is constructed of solid MDF with a heavy-duty baffle to virtually eliminate internal resonances and damp energy-stealing vibrations. You enjoy more efficient operation and more transparent sound.

why you should consider this product

The CS10 ensures a seamless transition between the fronts of your home theater system, providing a rock solid center image and crystal clear dialog. technical specifications

Driver Complements Tweeter 1" Diameter (2.54cm) 
Silk dome Dynamic Balance tweeter Mid/Woofer 2 - 5 1/4" Diameter (13.34cm)
Bi-laminate organic fiber cone

Electrical Total Frequency Response 53Hz-25kHz Upper -3dB Limit 24kHz

Lower -3dB Limit 63Hz Nominal Impedance 8 ohms

Efficency 91 dB Recommended Amplifier Power 20-125 Watts per channel

Inputs 5-way binding posts Dimensions Cabinet Size 6 1/2" H x 20" W x 9 3/4" D
(16.51cm H x 50.80cm W x 24.77cm D) Product Weight (each) 16 pounds Shipping/Other Unit of Measure Each Total Shipping Weight 18.25 pounds Warranty* Speaker Warranty 5 years parts and labor (original purchaser) *To ensure a valid warranty, Polk loudspeakers must be purchased through an Authorized Polk Audio home or car loudspeaker Dealer (such as Amazon.com). (If you're not sure a dealer is "authorized," call Polk Audio at 1-800-377-7655, and ask us.) The warranty is not transferrable, that means it applies only to the original purchaser. If you purchase your speakers from a private individual, that product is considered "used" and has NO factory warranty, no matter what the seller implies. The warranty is VOID if the serial number of the speaker has been removed or defaced. If you have any questions about your warranty coverage, or you think you need service, call Polk Customer Service at 1-800-377-7655. We’re here to help you get the most from your new speakers!

feature_bullets: 1 Inch (25 millimeter) Fabric/Polymer Composite Dynamic Balance Dome Tweeter with powerful Neodymium magnet structure delivers clear and detailed high frequency response for realistic reproduction of vocals and instruments
Two 5 1/4 in Bi Laminate Composite Dynamic Balance Drivers are lightweight and stiff with good damping for high efficiency, excellent bass and lower distortion
Non resonant all MDF enclosure construction with 3/4 in thick baffles ensures cleaner, clearer, more lifelike sound quality
Unique Reversible design cabinets can be turned upside down to aim “up inches when placed under a video monitor
Five Way Binding Post Connectors for more secure hook up options
